Submodules

PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.BookBase module

Base class of excel workbook

History (most recent first): 3.0.1 2024/2/7 Add docstrings. 2.0.1 2023/3/11 Created.

class PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.BookBase.BaseWorkbook

Bases: ABC

add_sheet(s: Sheet, index: int = -1)

Add a sheet to workbook. If index is -1, append to the end. Otherwise, insert at the given index.

Parameters:

  • s (Worksheet) – The sheet to add.

  • index (int) – The index to insert the sheet.

engine: type[EngineBase] | None = None
load(file: str | IOBase | bytes)

Load excel workbook from file.

Parameters:

file (ReaderStream) – file stream to load.

Returns:

None

property nsheets

Return the number of sheets in workbook.

Returns:

The number of sheets in workbook.

Return type:

int

save(file: str | IOBase | None)

Save excel workbook to file.

Parameters:

file (WriterStream) – The target file. Can be a string or a file-like object with a write method. If it’s None, The file will be saved in memory.

Returns:

If param ‘file’ is None, return the file content as bytes. Otherwise, return None.

Return type:

Optional[bytes]

sheet_by_index(idx: int)

Return the sheet with the given index.

Parameters:

idx (int) – The index of the sheet.

Returns:

The sheet with the given index.

Return type:

Worksheet

Raises:

IndexError – If the index is out of range.

sheet_by_name(name: str)

Return the sheet with the given name.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the sheet.

Returns:

The sheet with the given name.

Return type:

Worksheet

Raises:

KeyError – If no sheet with the given name exists.

property sheets

Return all sheets in workbook.

Returns:

List of all sheets in workbook.

Return type:

list[Worksheet]

Excel workbook implement.

History (most recent first): 3.0.1 2024/2/7 Add docstrings. 2.0.1 2023/3/11 Created.

class PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.BookType.WorkbookXLS

Bases: BaseWorkbook

WorkbookXLS class. Support Excel 97-2003 Document.

alias of EngineXLS

Bases: BaseWorkbook

WorkbookXLSX class. Support Excel 2007+ Document.

PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.Engine module

Base class of excel engine.

History (most recent first): 3.0.1 2024/2/7 Add docstrings. 2.0.1 2023/3/11 Created.

class PyAutoExcel.Documents.Workbook.Engine.EngineBase

Bases: ABC

Base class of excel engine. Abstract methods should be implemented by subclasses.

abstract classmethod read(file: str | IOBase | bytes) → list[Sheet]

Read excel file and return a list of sheets. Subclasses should implement this method.

Parameters:

file (Union[str, io.IOBase, bytes]) – The file to read.

Returns:

A list of sheets.

Return type:

list[Sheet]

abstract classmethod save(file: str | IOBase | None, sheets: list[Sheet])

Save a list of sheets to an excel file. Subclasses should implement this method.

Parameters:

  • file (Union[str, io.IOBase, None]) – The file to save to.

  • sheets (list[Sheet]) – A list of sheets to save.

Module contents

This package contains the book classes.

Classes:

WorkbookXLS - XLS Workbook (Binary format) WorkbookXLSX - XLSX Workbook (OpenXML format) BaseWorkbook - Base class for Workbook classes
